tech_news.title: Forza Horizon 6: More Details on The Country, The Culture and The Cars of Playground Games’ Japan - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: Forza Horizon 6 is coming on May 19 - find out more about the cars and culture of Playground Games' Japan in our huge Developer_Direct interview.

tech_news.title: Claude Code is suddenly everywhere inside Microsoft - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft is increasingly adopting Claude Code, despite selling its own GitHub Copilot AI tool. Microsoft’s developers are now testing out both to compare them.

tech_news.title: Sony announces its first turntables in years - The Verge
tech_news.description: The PS-LX3BT and PS-LX5BT turntables will come out in February and April, respectively, and are aimed at new and existing vinyl fans alike.

tech_news.title: Live: Watch The Xbox Developer Direct 2026 Showcase Here - Pure Xbox
tech_news.description: Highlighted by Fable and Forza Horizon 6!

tech_news.title: Google’s AI Mode can now tap into your Gmail and Photos to provide tailored responses - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: The company notes that AI Mode doesn’t train directly on your Gmail inbox or Google Photos library. Instead, it trains on specific prompts and the model’s responses.

tech_news.title: Wrap the Karin Everon RS in the New Mosh Mosh Livery - Rockstar Games
tech_news.description: The Karin Everon RS (SUV) was already oversized and overpowered. Now add ‘over-the-top’ to that list by wrapping it in the brand new Mosh Mosh livery, available now from any Vehicle Workshop.

tech_news.title: Nintendo Switch 2 led December sales in the U.S., now at 4.4 million, doubled Switch 1's performance - Nintendo Everything

tech_news.title: Nintendo is following up Alarmo with a weird Talking Flower in March - The Verge
tech_news.description: ﻿The interactive toy will be available for preorder today and launches on March 12th.
